entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
